title: Motorola announces anniversary celebrations on Flipkart on February 20-21 : News, News - India Today
text:
Last Updated: FEB 18, 2017 New Delhi Email Author 
Motorola is holding a sale on Flipkart in order to celebrate its three years of Moto products in India. The Lenovo-owned company has announced 'Moto Days Offers', a two days sale on Flipkart which starts from February 20. 
The company is giving a discount of up to Rs 2000 on the purchase of new models like Moto Z and Z Play and up to Rs 20,000 off on exchange for their old smartphones during the sale. There's a flat discounts of up to Rs 1,000 on devices like Moto G Turbo edition and Moto M. Moto is also giving a 10 per cent discount to the IndusInd Bank credit card users. 
During the sale, the Motorola-made Nexus 6 will be sold at a discounted price. The 32GB variant will be available for Rs 19,999, while the 64GB variant will be selling at Rs 25,999. The Moto G (2nd Gen) will be available for Rs 6,999 for the 16GB variant, while the Moto G (3rd Gen) will be available for Rs 7,999 for the 8GB variant. Also Read: Motorola Moto Z review: The most underrated phone of 2016 
The Moto E Power will get a discount of up to Rs 500 lowering the the price to Rs 7,499. The Moto E (2nd Gen) 3G variant will cost Rs 4,999, while the 4G supporting model will sell at Rs 5,999.
